Advanced data
NPC ID7758

Mernia is a mermaid who looks after the underwater seaweed farming patches on Fossil Island. She charges 200 Numulites per patch.

Shop[edit | edit source]

Mernia also sells basic farming tools, which can be accessed by talking to her, and asking "Can you sell me something?" It is not an actual shop and it has no set stock; each item has to be bought individually through the dialogue.

Sells at: 100.0% • Buys at: 100.0% • Change per: 1.0%
